scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && sass src/styles/index.scss:dist/styles.css --no-source-map && pug src/pages --out dist && cpx 'src/assets/**/*' dist/assets
scripts.build:watch: mkdir -p dist && sass src/styles/index.scss:dist/styles.css --watch & pug src/pages --out dist --watch & cpx 'src/assets/**/*' dist/assets --watch
